Hero.title: WELCOME TO MY PERSONAL WEBSITE!
Hero.subtitle: This is my personal website. You might want to stick around for a while. Here's a button if you want to reach me directly!
Hero.heroNote: My resume and social media account is above on the page.

webDevelopment.description: I am passionate and experienced in game development. I have experience in developing entertaining games using various game engines and programming languages. My aim is to provide quality and user-centered solutions at every stage, from graphic design to game mechanics.

webDesign.description: I am experienced in software development. I have worked on various platforms such as web applications, mobile applications, and desktop software. I am knowledgeable in generating innovative solutions, enhancing efficiency, and improving user experience.

UIUX.description: I am as knowledgeable about game design and mechanics as I am passionate. I have experience in creating addictive game mechanics that prioritize user experience and balanced game design.

SEO.description: I have extensive experience in game programming and am knowledgeable about optimizing game performance. I am proficient in areas such as memory management and graphic optimization. I use advanced techniques and best practices to ensure games run smoothly.

mainContent.title: Efe Mesudiyeli
mainContent.description: I'm Efe, a young game developer certified as a Unity Junior Programmer, proficient in various game engines including Unity. After progressing in front-end web development for a long time, I shifted my focus to game development, which has been my true passion, and I have developed myself in this field. Additionally, I also have a YouTube channel where I teach what I know to new developers and build a community.
mainContent.note: Thank you for stopping by! Whether you're a fellow developer or someone interested in collaborating, feel free to reach out. I'm open to connecting with you. Best regards,
